video.title: Monster Fish
video.synopsis: From Australia's river shark to Nicaragua's killer tarpon, biologist Zeb Hogan travels the globe in search of the biggest, fiercest fresh water fish.

episodes.synopsis: Zeb Hogan and his crew team up with a fisherman in the Deep South to see if a record-breaking giant catfish the size of a car really exists.
episodes.title: Giant Catfish

episodes.synopsis: Zeb and his team brave the rugged Alaskan wilderness and face hungry bears on a mission to find colossal king salmon during mating season.
episodes.title: Salmonzilla

episodes.synopsis: Zeb scours the imposing landscapes of the Pacific Northwest for the green sturgeon -- an elusive giant whose species co-existed with dinosaurs.
episodes.title: Green Goliath

episodes.synopsis: Zeb hunts for an endangered goldfish that's as big as a cow, and his search for the behemoth 600-pound carp takes him to Thailand's Chao Phraya River.
episodes.title: 600 lb. Goldfish

episodes.synopsis: Malaysian fishermen guide Zeb on a quest to find the voracious wallago catfish, a formidable predator rumored to swallow monkeys and porcupines.
episodes.title: Jungle Jaws

episodes.synopsis: Zeb and Florida shark experts team up to catch a bull shark, and decide if the deadly creatures may be moving inland into America's suburban waters.
episodes.title: River Shark!

episodes.synopsis: When experts receive reports of whiprays and stingrays up to 16 feet long and 1,200 pounds, they must investigate to confirm the incredible details.
episodes.title: World's Biggest Stingray

episodes.synopsis: Fish biologist Zeb Hogan heads deep into Guyana in search of the fearsome wolf fish that can grow to three feet long and weigh nearly 88 pounds.
episodes.title: River Wolf

episodes.synopsis: The Brazilian Amazon lures Dr. Hogan as he travels to find an elusive freshwater eel species with an electric shock five times stronger than a socket.
episodes.title: Amazon Shocker

episodes.synopsis: With the look of a snake and an ability to live on land, the snakehead is a fish native to Thailand. Dr. Hogan's team is determined to locate one.
episodes.title: Frankenfish

episodes.synopsis: Biologist Dr. Zeb Hogan treks into the Nicaraguan rainforest in search of the powerful giant tarpon: a 300-pound fish that takes fishermen hours to reel in.
episodes.title: Silver Devil

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Hogan and shark scientist Dr. Jonathan Weery traverse Australia's rivers in search of the dangerous bull shark and the elusive speartooth.
episodes.title: River Jaws

episodes.synopsis: Fish expert Zeb Hogan heads to Guyana in search of a predatory fish with 6-inch fangs. Its local name is payara, but most call it the vampire fish.
episodes.title: Vampire Fish

episodes.synopsis: Zeb Hogan teams up with scientists in Florida to catch and tag an enormous 7-foot goliath grouper and to explain its even bigger reputation.
episodes.title: Shark Eating Goliath

episodes.synopsis: Found swimming in Argentina's rivers is the largest stingray in South America and fish biologists get up close to the freshwater beast.
episodes.title: 400 lb. Super Stinger

episodes.synopsis: Zeb is in southern France hoping to catch a 650-pound Wels catfish with an unusually voracious appetite for everything from fish to birds and frogs.
episodes.title: Giant Killer Catfish
